Class netscape.application.TextParagraph 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.TextParagraph
public class TextParagraph
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Codable
Object representing a paragraph (a sequence of TextStyleRuns) formatted according to a TextParagraphFormat and ending with a return character.

Note: This class mostly works, but its API has not been refined or reviewed, and remains mostly undocumented for now.
